name: Happiness: Prelude
description:
Happiness: Prelude is a top-down game made out of curiosity to get back into making games after over ten years.

This particular game is just a demo I made to play around with, but will eventually become something more similar to a Zelda style game.

Use the arrow keys to move and the spacebar to interact.  The mouse is used in the beginning menus.

Feel free to play around with it and let me know what you think.  I appreciate any and all input.

Note: Not all the assets are final and there are some interface assets missing outright.
